content.detailedDescription:
I was at the front yard of my house. i was just relaxing after sun set, 7:12 p.M. i saw the sky at west looking for venus and jupiter that lying there on this month, then i look the sky in north direction between my house and the neighbour's house when i saw in the sky a dark and solid flying object with spherical shape passing in se direction over my neigbourhood and then fade away over the "jardín botánico nacional" 3 mile away from downtown santo domingo, dominican republic.    

i thought that i needed whitnesses and i called my wife and children and i showed them the flying oject.

at the first time i thought it was an air balloon, but i realize that this object isn't a air balloon or any other known aircraft because the object looked solid or metalic. 


the aircraft was an sphere between 6 to 8 meters in diameter, black color with soft shades of gray and with a solid texture. the sustained and straight way in which the aircraft flew is not typical for air balloons. the speed was aproximately 300 km/hour. the aircraft don't have propellers, external engines, windows and basket like a air or helium ballon.The flight was silent and without scape gases and without navigation lights.The height of flight was about 500 feet and was constant during all event. 

i feel shocked bacause this sighting was rare and possibly an ufo  experience. i never before had had an ufo experience.I never before had believed in ufo or extraterrestial intelligence. i'm civil engineer with master degree. i am a professional trained in mathematical and physical sciencies. my job is estimating distances, meansures, volume, areas, etc. i do all kind of observations to appreciate and solve physical problems with  mathematical models.  i am not easily impressed for all i see. we were completely sober at the time of the sighting and we are people that not need the media attention or any other thing.

i dont took photos because the camera wasn't ready at the time of facts. 

a half hour after the sighting i called to operations center of "aeropuerto internacional de las americas" 19 miles from santo domingo  to report the event. they took note of my phone number and name, but they hasn't called  to me back. i called to radio station z101 to report event too. 

 i lose sight of the object like any other aircraft that fade away and losses as a point in the distance.
content.summary: I saw  a solid spherical object flying over my neighborhood in se direction,whitout noise in straight path, constant height and velocity of 300 km/hour approximately

content.detailedDescription:
No sighting, but i heard verbal confirmation from my [name removed\dr\cms]that he had dealt with one. i was a small child living a neighborhood in roswell nm. i woke up to the sound of my dad yelling on the phone to one of his superiors. this is what i heard as i slipped out of my bedroom.
"why do i have to fly that damn inhuman thing to florida when their are plenty of pilots under me that could"! "i am aware of the seriousness of this thing but i am tired of dealing with this and those freakish little creatures"! then i got caught because i coughed. he came storming out of his office and jumped my butt. he demanded to know what i had heard. i at 7 years old started crying. then he shook me and said-if you ever repeat anything you heard you will put our whole family in danger. he then said do you understand? he shook me violently and told me to go back to bed without the water i had wanted in the first place. i don't know if this is interest you or not but this is my experience with ufo's.
content.summary: Didn't see read below

content.detailedDescription: On may 14 2008 at about 4am me and a couple of co workers was heading to work towards twenty nine palms on route 62 north from the 10 east. we were on the 62 for about 10 minutes, by the wind mills still. as we drove north 2 out of four of us saw a big bright blue ball of fire that look as if it got brighter the closer it got to the ground. we watched it untill it desiperd behind the hills ahead of us but it looked to be at least 200 miles away when it crashed. after we all freaked out and talked about it the rest of the way to work. 6 mounths later i was surfing the web and came across an event that took place near needles ca about an object that crashed out there near the river and for about a week after they had the black vans out there. it may have been a metour or something but i believe it was something else because i didnt tell anyone else but my wife about that morning and when i found that out on youtube about the black vans in needles it came to me that that would be the direction of travel and crash when we seen it coming down. i know now theres more than what were being told. [link moved to fi section\dr\cms]
content.summary: Bright blue ball of flames that looked like it landed near needles ca.

content.detailedDescription:
I had heard an explosion which made me check out all cameras on manhattan 
seeing if a fire was occurring and where ... the weather has been gorgeous but the news keeps warning us about fires and rain storms. we get some lights but not the usual.


i saw so much activity today i felt i had to tell someone.

every rooftop seemed to have a craft on it and some small to enormous figures as well near or on roof with it. i have seen them for quite a while but i feel like allot more locals were aware as well. 
they usually cloak so well but they seem to be letting their antennas down so to speak


i wish to enclose one video and 1 photo for now, i have daily videos and pics documenting the oddest things i have ever seen without duplicates except for the black hurling balls, the lights at night have all been different lengths colors and girths from one rod to 3 
sometimes over hudson, sometimes in the buildings sucking energy it looks like.


be prepared to turn down audio, it sounds sometimes worse than a train wreck
below is an upload to you tube of the weirdest most compelling objects i have ever videotaped.[link moved to fi section\dr\cms]
content.summary: First there was a large black asteroid like ball that was hurling cross the skybut the craft that taliled it ii never saw it waws like a sandwich at times but looked like a satin big piillow.

content.detailedDescription: W t flip i know what i seen thats it see and belive or go away i will not submit any thing on line .But if you want to reach me call [phone # removed/dr/cms]    please use descrestion men in black need not bother im already terminal.
content.summary: A large, oval, object in the sky, glowing orange, red, yellow and white, on an easterly path, about 1,000 feet above the ground, and 100' in size.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in middle school at the time camping out with a friend in my parent's back yard. we saw the large glowing orange ball stop and hover over the  field that was about 3 houses down from us. we went to get a closer look. 
i stood under a large glowing orange orb that had a misty\fog like exterior for about 20 minutes in a field near my house at about 0200 in the morning. 
it was about 5 telephone poles high directly above me.
the night sky was clear warm and calm. there were no temperature changes, wind, or noted sounds under the orb. it slightly and slowly dimmed to pinkish orange and then back to brighter orange again several times. looking directly at it was like looking into a gas, no definite solid surface could be seen. when the orb prepared to leave it created white clouds around it, slowly started to lift up and to the north east and then went out of sight at tremendous speed.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: I stood under a large orange orb that had a misty\fog like exterior for about 20 minutes in a field near my home.

content.detailedDescription: Every night i go out to view the night time sky.  even on cloudy nights because there will be some breaks in the clouds so i can view the night time sky.   i was looking up to view as i always do the in the lens i see it i look up from the lens to watch it. it can straight down from space as it did the air had a slight glowing at first and at first thought i said to my self it is a meteor and it is headed straight for my home. it was huge. the  contrail was huge as it came down. then it stopped and stayed there . the contrail slowly faded away  i did make out a greenish blue and red lights as it set there not moving . also here most commercial airlines planes do  fly over in there normal flight pattern as they head to atlanta to land  at the same time. a commercial airline was flying  i could very easy see it and its lights and i could tell it was headed to atlanta.  because of the cloud cover i do not think the pilots saw it. by the size and the height of the craft. above the normal flight paths of the commercial airplane. the craft was between 10 to 15 thousand feet higher than that. it stayed there for a few minutes as i watched it. i do know all the types of aircraft flying, and  this was not a military aircraft or any commercial aircraft. then this craft went from a stand still to super sonic in a split second. this craft crossed the sky in less a second. when i saw it move i said wow and before the wow sound was out it was gone. and this is not the first time i have seen this type of thing happen here i have also seen the  so called top secret u.S. aurora craft fly over and the two other better newer so called secret craft  which i will not name here  and this craft was not one of them either.  and this craft was at least 500 feet wide.
content.summary: This was not a military aircraft or any other normal aircraft

content.detailedDescription:
Awoke from bright light (like sunlight) and windy noise. immediately i thought a helicopter was hovering very near the rooftop. the trees were swaying from any direction, wind. i never saw any object.Located in my uncles summer bungalo in goshen, new york. i ran to the window. watched from behind the curtain, an open window.  3 thin beings leap over a fence, like they had springs in their shoes. all wearing white suites. a"child" came next to leap over the fence but fell back. i giggled because i know how to climb over the broken fence .They must have heard my thoughts as i giggled, they saw me. came in my room. don't have any idea how, as though i just blinked and one was in my room. he exrayed me from head to toe. i realized i was paralyzed as the scanning was happening. brilliant colors from the beings head area going thru my body. i saw my organs, like thru a clear glass. they heard my thoughts and i heard his. one of my ovaries was disturbing to him. when he was finished exraying me, he told me to go back to sleep. he wouldn't leave till i went back to sleep.I was frightened because when i'd open an eye to see if he'd gone, his eyes got angry. the next morning as i awoke, i ran outside to see any footprints or any sign that we had visitors. the brown leaves in the grass showed nothing. then you say, "ah, it must of been a dream". my aunt and uncle sat with me while we had coffee and donuts for breakfast. my cousin michael woke up and came running in the kitchen to look out the window. yelling "did you see the clowns!? the circus!".  i opened my eyes and mouth ready to say something, but didn't. thought it be best to talk to michael outside later on in the day. he had no recall at all.
this may have happened approximately at age 15. at age 38 i had a parcial hysterectomy. the doctor told me my left side was unusual. i could have told him that.  the being made it clear to me that this didn't look good. i guess i'm blessed. i never could conceive. and if i could, the being may have had other intensions that night.This never occurred to me till about a year ago.
also another girl named [name removed/dr/cms] (can't think of her last name) was at least 18 years old. i was told she had a sexual encounter of some kind and was upset. i never saw her again. the grownups preferred never to talk about such things. i guess they were afraid.
content.summary: They visited at night. scanned my body, and made me go back to sleep

content.detailedDescription:
If this is a real site would like to talk to someone . the lights seen years ago 4 witnesses i thought military but nothing i have ever seen could do what they where doing.That's no my reason for contacting you.
few month back i go fishing in a swamp in florida on gulf coast .We got stuck in shallow water by two islands on the gulf of mexico.This is a very secluded place . had 4 hrs to wait for tied to get boat un stuck so we walked around the island .Started see peaces of a small boat that had been wrecked .As i was looking for numbers on boat to tell marine patrol .I found a two ft circle area .Looked like something was standing thier in the 2 ft circle looking back and forth.The ft print looked like 3 fingers removed from a balling ball and pressed into sand many time only 3 or 4 where complete.The area was below tide line and sand was damp and hard packed.Im a outdoors man i thought got to be some kind of animal but took some pitures to prove what i saw. no animal makes a print like this that is on record.And no one would do this for a hoax because island is of limits for ppl we just got stranded there.I found two internet pictures that match the one i seen both in snow and both said same thing i say no track in or out .I dont no what i found and there's so much crap on internet i think real truth is hard to find for some reasons theses print are hunting me a little .Im not looking for anything and realy dont even like to tell the story because ppl think your nuts. i did show them to a federal fish and game agent that with a half second glance said they where crabs .That's imposable been fishing and camping on theses island for 25 years .We have seen strange light twice at night out there. if this story sound like maybe something else you have heard or seen please email me . looking for a answer . thanks dan  4 ppl seen lights 2 ppl seen prints
content.summary: Have two first one was lights of in distance makeing a square

content.detailedDescription: I was standing in my driveway and looked up in the sky as i do from time to time. at first i thought nothing of this object as it was a flashing light similar to any old airplane. but as i kept watching this object, i noticed the red light did not waver. only the white light was strobing. then, as i continued to watch this object, i noticed it was stationary and way too high (in my experience) to be a helicopter. something felt strange about it. so i grabbed my iphone and started filming it. the object began to move in a southern direction quickly.  it then appeared to stall and hover holding it's position for a moment. it then changed direction heading back the direction it just came from. i had zoomed in to capture it better, but realized that there was no reference point. i zoomed out and caught the object again hovering or slowing way down. then it moved some more headed north west. it slowed and shot a little forward and then again sped forward quicker. headed north west. at that point the object continued off in that direction until it was out of sight. i wish i had a better camera near by. it was definitely unusual. i will attempt to post the video. but do not believe i can do so from my iphone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: Solid red light with flashing white strobe. hovered and changed direction mid flight.

content.detailedDescription:
I knew that they weren't satellites. i have seen many since spudnik. i was sitting in my chair swing, talking on my cell, gazing up at the dipper. it could have been going on a bit longer, but i noticed very far off into space somewhat higher than the dipper. objects, one at a time, about 30 seconds to one minute apart appearing out of the same small section, out of the north west. moving towards the east at a high rate of speed(approximately 20 times the speed of satellites) and disappearing into another section of space. 

i've been too shy to report it up to now, but thought that the right people should know. i really didn't think too much of it although it's was my first time to see anything like it before(at age 61), or since. i've always known of their existence, so i didn't panic, and have never said much about it. 

i consider myself a very calm and collected type, and i don't ever exaggerate, or make things up to get attention like others that i've seen.

now i definitely know that we're not alone. believe what you wish!
content.summary: 6-8 satellite like objects, very far, came out of the same little section of space.

content.detailedDescription: I was 7or8 yrs old and i had just left the cow barn to go home for supper i was on my little red bike and i had to push it up the road away from the farm which is on a steep hill .I got to the top of the hill where there is a stop sign stopped to look for cars and catch my breath i happened to look up and there was a long cylinder like object silver of course with round looking widows in it just over the trees on the other side of the road i looked at it a little bit started peddling done the road i went around 200ft and stopped and looked up to my left and it had moved parrelel. to me i stood there a bit then continued down the road and very time i looked up it was beside me i started peddling like crazy road turned and it was gone when i got home and ran inside and told my mother she said there was no such thing but i remember it now like it happened yesterday.Saw orbs on the farm yrs later
content.summary: I was on a bike and other hovered kinda over me and followed me a short distance before i turned away peddling like crazy

content.detailedDescription:
1983 -
my sister and father where in different parts of our house but they both noticed a big cigar shaped object with lights falling from the sky, my sister got scared, at first she thought it was a bomb, the object was falling down and as it got between two building it freeze and after some seconds took off in amazing speed and got lost behind some far mountains. it was even reported in a greek newspaper back then, the ufo that appeared in the athens sky after the rain.


summer of 1984 -
my sister (a teenager back then) got back home late around midnight, she noticed the time because my father was angry she was late. she got to bed around 00.15 and as she was ready to sleep she heard 3 slight knocks on the shutter (we lived on the ground floor and there was a garden outside the window). instead of her gettin scared (she does get scared easily!!!) she got up and placed her ear on the shutter, our dog (a german shepherd that was tied with a chain under the window in the garden) screamed (cryin not barking) and my sister jumped in shock like she just woke up, she noticed the clock, it was 3.00, she missed 3 hours! next day the dog's chain was broken and the dog was missing, we found it some days later close to our house sick, the dog survived though. 

summer of 1985 - 
my sister is gettin home again around midnight and she notices outside our garden a short guy (my sister is short, around 1.60 cm height, this guy was so short that his head was on her stomach!) dressed in winter black clothes (summer in greece is really hot!) with black hat and huge black sunglasses (in the night!) that covered most of his face, as she passed by she noticed his skin was kinda yellow. he didn't talk to her, all he did was staring at her and my sister got a feeling of evil and fear, like this guy could somehow give those emotions on her. she passed him by, got inside our garden, turned back to look at him again cause she had read about men in black, when she looked at him again, it was like his body had stayed in the same direction and his neck had got out of place with him looking at her! she freaked out and run inside the house, some minutes later the shutter (same shutter!) started knocking like a tree was crushing on it, she woke up my mother and they both acted like something was controling their thoughts and they couldn't think clear, they didn't even think of calling the police or anything! the noise happened again some minutes later and then it was over. (my sister also claims that the rest of us were missing during that time and we should be there!)

sorry for my grammar and english mistakes! i was just a baby at the time so unfortunately i can't remember anything on my own. it's what they told me.
content.summary: Black cigar shaped with lights

content.detailedDescription:
Hola chicos me llamo guillermo y tengo dudas sobre una foto que tomamos en nuestras vacaciones con mi familia
si ustedes nos pueden dar una explicación se los agradeceria
content.summary: La observada en la foto

content.detailedDescription: I was floating in the lake with a lifejacket.  at one point i floated on my back and looked in the sky.  i saw what i thought was a grey plane going from east to west at cloud level.  i kept looking for the wings but never found any.  it was a circular dome moving at a steady pace.  the craft passed through the next cloud set and never came out the other side.  i never saw it again.
content.summary: Through clouds

content.detailedDescription: I have seen it a total of 4 times, it was later in the evening i was leaving work. i started driving and noticed this bright light in the sky to my left. it was very big and glowed bright orange. the second light appeared and then a third, it made a triangular pattern and just hovered. i was in awe of what i saw and i picked up the phone and called my dad. i told him what i was seeing and then it dissappered. and with in seconds reappeared about a mile away. it didn't fly or move it was there one second and gone the next. it wasn't a plane or night para shooters it was a ufo.
content.summary: A light appeared then another then another in a triangle formation it just hovered

content.detailedDescription: The first time this happen was mother days and i thought it was a one time event and today they come back bright lights and buzzing again. this time i wasn't afraid but again it keep me up. i did went to check on my family and showed them the light i dare not go outside and with up stair to the living room and slept to wait it out. when i woke up it was gone.
content.summary: Beam of light with vibranting and buzz

content.detailedDescription: While driving north toward idaho through northern utah, i cross over a low pass when i noticed a very large object hovering just above a ridge approximately 1/2 mile to the nw of me. continuing to drive north the tan colored long cylinder shaped craft rotated with its lower side toward me, at which time i could see that it actually shaped like a triangle with a concaved side and two straight sides. the craft appeared to be three to five hundred feet along each side of the triangle, forty feet thick from top to bottom, a dull tan color with a darker brown circle on the bottom. as the craft rotated to about a 60 degree angle it moved slowly down behind the ridge. i heard no sound from this object. i watch the craft for 2 to 3 minutes while driving north. knowing that over the next ridge i could see to the sw for miles, i sped over the ridge to see the craft again but the canyon was empty. i do not know what this object was, but i do know that i saw something unexplainable.
content.summary: Diving north from ogdon, cross low pass and noticed large object hovering above ridge to nw, cylinder craft rotated where i could see in was shaped like a triangle, then slid behind ridge.

content.detailedDescription: My roommate and i were on a quartz covered hill 2 miles south of my house (approx 1 mile south of ray rd and 187th ave)sky watching. the sky initially had some wispy clouds that had cleared at the time of the sighting and it was fairly windy mostly from the southwest to the northeast if i remember right and the moon was half full,so it was fairly bright out. the evening had been uneventful aside from a couple of satellites that sped by. at approx 9:45 to 9:50 pm we were packing up to go home and as i turned around rather abruptly after putting some stuff in my truck (i was facing south) and directly to the se just over the mountain range towards mobile/maricopa, i believe they are called the maricopa mountains, i witnessed 4 large bright orange/amber lights come on in succession one at a time from left to right in a straight line i called to my roommate to look and he saw them as well.There was no drifting or wavering, and they went out in the same manner from left to right the a couple of seconds later it repeated in the exact same manner from left to right but appeared to have moved in a straight linear path to the west slightly.This same exact pattern repeated 2 times then stopped for a minute or so then one single light came on and appeared to close in on itself then disappear all together. we hung around for a little while longer but nothing else occurred. prior to this happening there were several groups of military planes coming out of lafb flying by at high speed headed in a southward direction. during the time of the sighting there were no military planes in sight or within hearing distance. as i stated it was quite windy that evening but there was no drifting of the lights and they remained inline and an equal distance apart as if fixated to something. there were no smoke trails as would be from flares nor did they behave like flares in any way, again, remaining the exact same distance apart in a straight line. we continued to pack up then proceeded to go home. [name removed/dr/cms] (mufon member 18680)
content.summary: 4 glowing orbs in straight line turning on and off sequentially from left to right

content.detailedDescription:
I went on to my deck to record the night sky with my night vision camera system. as soon as i looked up i saw objects flying overhead. they were mostly on a due-north heading, but one flew westward at a low altitude over my position and one stopped directly above. i attempted communication by pointing a laser communicator in its direction. when it saw the laser, it immediately sped off to the west with incredible acceleration. it went from a stop to full speed in about 1 second. that means it pulled more than 90 g's from a stop in the sky! 
a few made course correction changes along the way, but for the most part, all of them were on the exact same path. since most were on the same northbound heading, they seemed to be en-route to a common destination. they passed overhead in the same location in the sky and were separated by only a few seconds. i'd follow one with my camera, and as soon as it was out of sight and i returned my camera to viewing straight up, another one would come and the process would repeat. at the most frequent, the ones i saw were only 6 seconds apart. on average, they were about 20 seconds apart.
there were a few groups of craft. one group had 3 flying in formation side-by-side-by-side. as that group passed overhead, the one on the right broke formation to go around a slower one the group was passing.
i estimate the altitude of the majority of the craft to be approximately 10,000'. this estimate was reached as the combination of 2 observations. i illuminated one at the end of an ir laser. the laser is 830nm which is not visible to the human eye, but is visible in night vision for several thousand feet. the craft was past the end of the beam (indicating the altitude was more than 5000’), but was close enough to be illuminated by it (so they weren’t in orbit). my location is within the controlled airspace of the oakland county international airport, and its airspace extends from ground level to 10,000'. i’m guessing they had an altitude of at least 10,000’, otherwise they’d be dodging a lot of civilian aircraft.
 they all had approximately the same speed.
i timed one of them and it took approximately 10 seconds to go from directly overhead to 20 degrees above the horizon. if the altitude was a minimum 10,000', the speed calculates out to be approximately 2000 mph, or roughly mach 3! other than the occasional nearby passing automobile traffic, i didn't hear any noise or any sonic booms.
referencing an aeronautical chart, directly south of my location is wright-patterson afb, and directly north is wurtsmith afb - which is now closed, but in the middle of 3 active military operations areas: steelhead moa, pike east moa and pike west moa. it seems to follow that a large portion of what i see each night is our black projects heading up to play around over the lake. i'd expect this to be the case with ones flying on a relatively straight path, but the fact that one stopped directly overhead and accelerated at speeds that would instantly kill a pilot leads me to believe one of two things: either they aren't ours, or if they are ours, its technology we took from the et's.
i realize our military has advanced technology that spawns its share of ufo reports. but, for these to be ours:
1.	they need to generate huge points of gravity outside the craft in order for the occupant to survive the 90+ g accelerations.
2.	the engines are beyond jets and combustion in order to avoid engine noise and exhaust trails.
3.	they need to move through the air without contacting somehow it in order to eliminate the sonic boom
4.	if there is a pilot, for him to see the laser from any angle, the craft would need to be completely transparent to the pilot and have embedded vision enhancements.
5.	if the craft is an unmanned drone, it needs to have enough computational power to be self aware (something we won’t be close to for a long time)
i give the military credit for having more speed and stealth than we are aware of, but those capabilities in a complete package, are hundreds of years away without help from et.

the full videos are about 15 gb in size, so i'm attaching a short video that contains only a few dozen samples of what i saw.

i don't expect any resolution to this case. i'm presenting it mostly so the people of the world will be more aware of what's happening in the world around them on a daily basis.
content.summary: 80 ufos in 2 hours

content.detailedDescription: On may 28th 2015 at 11:20pm in the south west direction sitting on our porch we saw a huge bright orange light rising behind the tree which it lit up and saw what we can only describe to look like a floating sun...We thought maybe it was a plane on fire or an asteroid...But as it came closer to us it slowed down and started to lower and hovered above our house for about 6 minutes and it was absolutely enormous (200 to 300 feet) and dead silent...We were frozen still looking at the flames (red, orange and yellow) shooting all around...The pulsating light it emitted was like a small sun hovering between 500 to 1000 feet above us...Then we saw the back of it which was a light black diamond shape with lights on the side...Then it started to ascend quickly and slightly turned north east and took off with such speed...We were absolutely in shock of what we saw.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We saw an enormous bright orange light which rose from behind a tree like a small sun lowered and hovered in dead silence then ascended  and took off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a walk with my dog at okeeheelee park like we do everyday. it was a very quiet morning. the sky was so beautiful because of all the different kinds of clouds, weather was warm and breezy out of the east. i happened to look up towards the sky (11:49 am),and saw this huge object over okeeheelee golf course that is just to the east of where i was walking in the park. trying to rationalize what i was looking at, i was thinking this is a huge strange kite? blimp? i have seen many different types of planes, helicopters, blimps, drones, kites etc to know it was not anything like that.
pbi and some heliports are not far from okeeheelee park so you see aircraft everyday. 

the object was cigar like in shape but it had like a dome/bump on the top half of it. also, it looked like a row of windows on the side.  what was really interesting is that it did not move or make any type of sound. i was about 500 ft away; and for its size you think you would hear sounds like aircraft make. i mentioned before about all the beautiful different types of clouds, well it was like this object was reflecting off of clouds to make it almost camouflage like if that makes any sense. the object was not in a cloud but many clouds around it. so some shine to it but also the dull grey of certain cloud colors.  i have experience using x-ray equipment at airport security so very familiar with picking out shapes and objects. 

i continued walking east towards the object with my dog and did not take my eyes off of it until we got to the point in the path where we turn left/north to head towards parking lot and ::poof:: it disappeared. also at this time my dog became very wary, upset, his tail clamped down, curled up under him, and he starts pulling hard to the north. he wanted out of there bad! my dog does not behave like that normally, he loves the park, something was upsetting him. there were no other people/dogs around or golfers on that part of the course. ironically on the 28 of may i brought my camera to the park to take photos of the poinciana trees in bloom...Ugh.  but i tried my best to capture the ufo in a sketch i did when i got home.
content.summary: Saw a cigar shape object, but part had a dome or bump up on top. stationary, no noise, windows, then vanished before my eyes.

content.detailedDescription: A friend of mine and myself were sitting outside of a school in the evening. directly in front of us was a corn field. i looked up in the sky and saw a light that looked like it could have been the sun. it got bigger as if it were getting closer. and i started breathing heavily and was slightly trembling. i looked over to see my friend staring at the sky too. the light finally stopped, moved to the left a little bit. then shot straight up. this was the 2nd time i saw this occurnance in the same area. it was far enough above us that i couldnt see it clearly. but it was bright enough out to know that was not an aircraft. im not sure what i saw but it was not normal. by the end my friend and i agreed not to talk about it because we were both so baffled as to what just happened. the first time this happened i was alone.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
Sleeping as far as i know 10:00 pm - 7:00 am
but i have been waking up at 3:00am - to 3:45 am for the past several months extending back to 2014. my cats would act strange sometimes. 

i have physical marks in some of my nail material (particularly the right middle, thumb and ring finger nail material also the left middle and thumb nail material).
content.summary: Unknown

content.detailedDescription:
My mom had picked me up from my grandmothers house after working her late shift. when were on our way home. i was asleep in the front passenger seat of the car with the seat laying back. i was awaken by mom talking in a calm voice trying not to frighten me. she kept saying my name until i opened my eyes. she told me that everything was okay and i needed to remain calm. i instantly found that i could not move and neither could she. the car was silent. the engine was off. i tried to remain calm but i couldn't. i kept trying to sit up with all my strength. then the car was flooded with a blinding light and then i could move. i sat up to the dashboard and watched the craft ascend very quickly and disappear.


years later i believe i was visited again. my girlfriend and i heard something humming late at night. the next day there was a burn in the grass that was not there the day before. the previous day her boys were playing on the slip n slide and i took a photo of them playing that showed the grass green and then the next day that exact spot had a dry spot that size of a basketball.

my father was stationed at cheyenne mountain. he said ufo anomalies were a daily thing.
content.summary: I was asleep in the front passenger seat when my mom woke me. i could not move.I had the seat down and could not get up.  then the car was flooded with a bright light and i lunged against the dash and saw the craft ascend and dissapear.

content.detailedDescription:
It was late august, 1970, just before the start of school...It was a sunday night... iit was a warm, dark night, no moon visible. me and two of my high school friends were bored and driving north on a blacktop road out of our small, central illinois town. there was no other traffic . it was after 8pm..
we stopped a few miles north of town to relieve ourselves (we had not been drinking)...Our vehicle was facing north, and i was standing, facing east.  about a mile to the east/northeast there was a large, glowing sphere moving north to south (not fast)...I was watching it and thought it was strange, because it looked different than a plane or helicopter, and it was making no sound at all (it was a warm, still night). i called to my friends and pointed it out, we then started yelling at it, acting silly like teenagers will... it kept moving south, away from us, so we got in the car and resumed heading north...I was on the passenger side, and me and my friend riding in the middle kept watching it. all of a sudden it changed directions and started moving northwest right towards us.  i told the driver, we all became excited/afraid at that point, and he punched the pedal of the car and we raced north on the blacktop. we kept watching it, and it covered the distance in amazing speed until it was just above the treeline to our northeast, moving north at the same speed we were (about 80 at that point). we were in a panic, but i was fascinated as well... this object,  glowing white/yellow brightly, with no visible structure that i could see... it was probably 100 feet or so from us, about 75 ftt in air, i am guessing it was about 40 - 60 ft in diameter,just above the trees, moving right with us. we were flying over the road like this for several miles when, all of a sudden, the sphere disappeared from the top down, as if looking at a window shade going down over a window....This really freaked us out, and we weren't sure  what would happen next, but nothing did...Although i don't remember how we ended up heading back swe got back to towouth to town, i'm sure it was because i was so freaked by everything....We got back to town and we were totally spent... we decided not to tell anyone fir a while, and we went home....This happened over 40 years and i saw one of my friends who was with me, just a few years ago....I asked him if he still remembered it, and he said he thinks about it all the time...I told him what i remembered, the whole story, and he said that is exactly how he remembered it too....
my youngest son and i also had a strange incident in october of 2000. i'm too tired of typing to tell that story right now, but will try too soon. 
thanks for reading this.
content.summary: Spotted glowing sphere about 1 mile away, moving south. we had stopped and were headed north. it suddenly changed directions and came right to us and chased us. (3 in car

content.detailedDescription: Was outside smoking a cigarette and looked up in the sky and seen an orb v-like formation was flying low and slow. no sound and very dim orange glow to it. was not symmetrical and based on how low and slow it was flying didn't appear to be man made. usaf eppley airfield is only a 20 minute drive to the north east of where i was at the time. not long before a thunderous flock of blackhawk helicopters were flying in the same path, but this was during the day. somewhere between 15-20 helicopters. thought we were being invaded, hard to believe it was some sort of training exercise, if it was it wasn't a cheap one.
content.summary: Dim lighted orbs flying in a v-like geese formation

content.detailedDescription: I was on world campus afloat in 1973 when i and a couple of people noticed a dark shadow with no sound moving through the water. it was not a shadow from above but under the water. it moved at high speed around the harbor of the seychelle islands where the ss universe was docking. the object appeared to be 10 to 15 feet long and did not disturb the water. however it was moving at speeds too fast for any water animal, fish. there was nothing in the air at the time to cast a shadow, and the shadow appeared to be below the surface. despite 42 some odd years i still remember this quite well. i had sort of put it out of my mind but recent descriptions of under water ufo's on history jogged my memory.
content.summary: Dark object traveling fast under water in the port of mahe, seychelles. too fast for fish or boat.

content.detailedDescription: I was in my car coming back from grocery store. this object was in view out my front  windshield.  i had not idea what it was.  i looked up and it looked like 3  large silver balls.  it was daylight around 12 o'clock noon so i couldn't tell if they were lights or not. there seemed to be something around the top of them.  out the corner of my eye i could see something else darker off to the left side a good ways off.  i was driving, so i had to look back down at my driving.  i looked back up in a few seconds and it was gone. i looked out my side window and out my back window. it had disappeared!   i arrived home in about 3 min., i got out of the car and looked all over the sky but could not see it anywhere. this is the weirdest thing that has ever happened to me.  i'm sure i won't forget it anytime soon and will keep asking around to see if anyone else in the area saw it.
content.summary: Saw 3 silver balls with something around top of them,  no noise..Out the corner of my left eye, i could see something over to my left a ways off that look dark, almost black.  disappeared quickly. i

content.detailedDescription: 1980 phx az. abducted by aliens ship running bases at night on baseball field , i can prove it , we were on the soccer team n my friends said i was gone 4-5 hrs impossible, the light beam finally caught me , it couldnt catch me by the metal fence , knocked me down and took me about 3 ft. off the ground , the fishlady came n got me  3 different species aboard the ship 2 lizard ninja turtle like workers , a fishlady/mermaid and 3 cone head doctors 2 were pretty female littler asst. cone heads < the turtles took me over to the table  n the tall cone head dr. he stuck a double syringe into my nose ,they had a tube in my mouth n a tube in my butt, the fish ladys webbed hand over my mouth stunk so bad it began to knock me out n dr. said his fathers 100% italian,the fish lady asked when will he remember dr.Said at 40 -44 i freaked , n now im 44 yrs old , the drs. cone head had on a purple long jacket had buttons every other one a big diamond then an ounce of gold , n so on, the fish lady got to crawl into her tank and eat a live crab right in front of me the inside 1/3 of the spaceship i seen was bad ass i drew pic in art class everyone laugh , told my mom and she remembers , just predicted  n prepared 5 days before my sister just passed  i knew theyre was gonna be a bad earthquake but i didnt know it was going to be inn nepal ..... i have physchic abilities know  i can tell u exactly the time somebodies going to call n who it is already on the phone calling , so they dropped me off on pitchers mound i rolled off and ran too follow it got water from the canal with the light then went up about 1000 ft. spun around super fast n took off at about 3000 mph. over south mountain. please call me mufon nobody believes me , my friends noticed on my mouth was green stuff n on my shirt they laughed  n did not believe me  , i was like an xray machine while chasing it , the swingsets where glown silver n i was the only thing running in red ...... mufon please contact me or im going to all my friends at luke air force base and talking with the generals n captains ......
content.summary: Coudnt catch me by metal fence white light beamed me up double syringe up my nose tube in my mouth n butt 3 different species aboard  call 602 502 5522 joey
